version_name: 1.2.1 is out !- Major registration and login improvements- The wheel of gifs (look for it in the conversation screens)- Bug fixes

version_description:
The version includes:
* Advanced security enhancments
* Group payments
* Push Notifications for new invitees
* Cool new UI improvments

Here is the new 1.2.7 version !
- Bug Fixes
- Major networking enhancements

Major GetGems Update!
We've updated the GetGems code with tons of new features
- Bots
- Channels
- Stickers
and much more !

For the first time you can use the GetGems keyboard to send and receive Gems on every social network !
The amazing GetGems keyboard is here. Invite a friend to join GetGems from anywhere and earn Gems!
To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store rapidly…Every update of our GetGems app includes improvements for speed and reliability.
